build.buildCommand: mkdir -p /app && cp -r website/backend/* /app/ && cp *.py /app/ && ls -la *.csv && cp -v *.csv / && cp -v *.csv /app/ && ls -la / | grep csv && ls -la /app | grep csv && cd /app && pip install -r requirements.txt

deploy.startCommand: python -c "import os; import uvicorn; port = int(os.environ.get('PORT', 8000)); uvicorn.run('app:app', host='0.0.0.0', port=port)"
